title: equippable
description: Defines an item that can be equipped by a unit.

documentation.description: Human friendly documentation that can be stored with the (human unfriendly) JSON. For optimized systems, this attribute should be pruned at run time.

id.description: Unique id for a particular instance of this type. As instances of equippables are assumed to be transferrable between the world and armies, all equippable instances should have an id.

effects.description: Intrinsic effects of this item, often granted to bearer when equipped.

name.description: Descriptive, unique name for this item.
